page.title: 10The Industrial Estate.
page.content: Since Asda opened the Industrial area has been growing but one factory ,a dairy has been open since 1948.It was built because all around there was very good grazing land for cattle and lots of water in the land for sterilizing purposes.There are{15} factorys so far on this site called{ {Dukes Park Estate}.Essex county council supplies,covers the largest site and supplies all the county councils property.The newest warehouse has been built ridiculasly near to the village.Two more warehouses are being built now.All the firms are building their warehouses because there is easy access to the coast and to{London}by good roads especially since the new{ {M25}has been opened.The Industrial Estate has provided over{650 jobs}and over 200 jobs have been taken by local people.
